original_text: So the elders of Moab and the elders of Midian departed with the fees for divination in their hand. And they came to Balaam and gave him Balak's message.
korean_text: 모압 장로들과 미디안 장로들이 손에 복채를 가지고 떠나 발람에게 이르러 발락의 말을 그에게 전하매

sentences.original_text: So the elders of Moab and the elders of Midian departed
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 모압 장로들과 미디안 장로들이 떠났는데

sentences.original_text: with the fees for divination in their hand.
